title: Portfolio
body: My personal portfolio web application is designed with mobile responsiveness and Backend admin page with CRUD functionalities ensuring a seamless experience across all devices. It focuses on providing a user-friendly interface with intuitive navigation, allowing visitors to explore content easily. The application features a visually appealing and charming UI. I have used React Js, SpringBoot and Firebase for development.

title: TransitGo
desc: Long Distance Bus Transport Management System
body:
This is our second year group project This is an application aiming the long route bus passengers which provide following functionalities
1. Real time Bus schedule and updates
2. Report and handling of lost and found announcements
3. Delay and announcement update and management
4. Package tranfering with traking ability
5. Role based user Authentication and Authorization and relevant access controls
Following technology were used in developing the web and mobile application React, React Native, Java (Springboot), MySQL. For the UI design we used Figma.
In the above project my part of contribution in developing both mobile and web application were:
1. User Authentication with email and otp verifications module
2. User Account Management module and Profile Management module
3. Admin Dashboard with control module
4. Role Based Authorization and Access Control
5. UI Design

title: Smart Centre Service BotAssistant
desc: Custom AI chatbot for an online application
body: A custom chatbot integrated into an application which can offer contextual assistance, handle FAQs, provide personalized recommendations, regarding the integrated application. Technologies used React, Gemini AI
